tool_description: News from world unbiased media including Reuters, PBS, NPR,CBS, UPI,AllSides, The New York Times
name: Russian  invasion of Ukraine
title: Russian  invasion of Ukraine

api_list.name: Get news from media
api_list.description: Get articles from all media listed above returned in a form of Jason.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://russian-invasion-of-ukraine.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "russian-invasion-of-ukraine.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://russian-invasion-of-ukraine.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "russian-invasion-of-ukraine.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
